id.description: A unique identifier for this node.  Camelcase string based on the name.

name.description: A descriptive name for this node

elementType.description: A BPMN 2.0 element type.  MUST match an item in the the given component library

description.description: A short summary of this step in the process

items.description: The IDs of nodes which this node connects to. Outbound connections only. Only a single outbound connection is allowed unless this is an exclusiveGateway node

inputs.description: The source of data for each input required by this component.

elementId.description: A unique identifier for a node

name.description: Name of the input required for this component

source.description: Source of data for the input; either the name of another node which can provide it, a constant value, or one of the explicitly-defined global variables

sourceType.description: "CONSTANT" if `source` is constant value or "NODE" if it is the name of a node which provides the value, or "GLOBAL" if it is a global variable

targetNode.description: The target node of this connection

description.description: A short text description of this connection
